channel.title: Rune-legacy Hunting Enabling
channel.description:
so, i Downloaded Rune-legacy fixed alot of content.
But one of the most coolest thing about the server and reason i downloaded it. is hunter.
The hunterhandler.java is Fully working, a guy said to me i just need to implement it. Can someone Help me with this?, or show it on Teamvieuw
I'm willing to reward with RSPG

item.title: Rune-legacy Hunting Enabling
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

You can’t offer rewards here, please read the rules: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,331370.0.html

But, I did try the source once and looked for the all amazing hunter and found nothing so I doubt there’s something that magically enables.

Read full topic
